body.name: DeepCool CH510 MESH Digital Mid-Tower ATX PC Case with LCD Display Magnetic Tempered Glass Gaming Case High-Airflow Panels with Front I/O USB Type-C Port for Mini-ITX/Micro-ATX/E-ATX, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 26 mins
features: CH510 MESH DIGITAL PC case is designed for high airflow performance to build an efficient cooling system thanks to the generous mesh open area in the front, top, rear to allow ample airflow

Monitor system information for critical CPU or GPU temperatures through the built-in digital display in the front panel of CH510 MESH DIGITAL gaming case, this practical visual design element serves a simple yet functional purpose

Via an easy installation and operation surface, the CH510 MESH DIGITAL PC case display of the temp either on the CPU or GPU can be shifted upon a simple click. Up to 11 different selectable languages suffice users from worldwide, and Celsius and Fahrenheit figures can be switched over following user’s need

The full-sized magnetic tempered glass side panel on CH510 MESH DIGITAL gaming case offers the most convenient way to mount glass panels with ease. An optional safety lock is featured for extra security during transport

Maximize potential with flexible configurations that meet the needs of any system setup. With space for large GPUs up to 380mm in length and 175mm in height, the CH510 MESH DIGITAL gaming case offers plenty of space without being too bulky.

Get connectivity for your modern devices needing with CH510 MESH DIGITAL PC case, USB Type-C port, USB 3.0 port and a combo audio jack for gaming headsets is settled front of the gaming case for better user experience.
body.description: The CH510 MESH DIGITAL is a forward thinking mid-tower ATX case designed for great airflow thanks to the abundance of fan mounting positions and the large mesh openings throughout the case. In addition, a digital display is included that reference CPU and GPU system temperatures for a functional visual effect. The CH510 MESH DIGITAL is ideal for high-performance systems with a spacious interior that makes building easy.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 64 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing case to build in!
reviews.reviewText: I know the picture might not be that good but I bought this as a gift for my friend along with a CPU cooler. I did the case swap and this case makes it super easy. One of the better cases that I have built in. I like how it has a Gpu anti sag bracket and a headset holder as well. It gets pretty good airflow as well and the case just looks so good. Very good case for first time builders for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spacious, intelligent, good looking
reviews.reviewText: UPDATED: I love the front panel, the digital is cool but if it’s not on it just looks weird. But when it’s on it’s niceFirst picture was original build before upgrades.Ryzen 7 5800x the og not the 3d lol, early adopterGigabyte b450m ds3h rev 1. Upgraded pictures is the Msi b550 a-pro atx4x8gb Corsair vengeance rgb proRx 5600 xt gigabyte OC rev 1. UPGRADE: rx 7900 xt, Xfx black editionI have each type of drive in this thingId cooling towerUpdate: deep cool ls720 360mmPsu was originally thermaltake smart 500w. Updated psu is thermaltake toughpower gf3 1000wRgb strip is ezdiy fab 1000mmI transferred most of these parts from my old deep cool mattrexx 30 case.Simply changing cases improved my benchmarks with the same hardware from the better airflow.Fans are thermaltake riing quad 120( I returned these due to disconnecting issues) update: coolermaster 120 halo fans.Case:Both side panels come off in very clean ways. The magnets on the glass panel are very strong, I need to use 2 hands and I can bench my body weightThe rear panel has thumbscrews that stay on the panel so they don’t fall on the floor. Big plusThere is a decent amount of room for cable management but it is a little tricky trying to fit rgb controllers and fan hubs. Now if you do not have a hard drive those would be no problemSpeaking of hard drive. The mounting tray unscrews and slides out allowing you to mount 2 3.5 inch hdd. Or you can mount 1 hdd and mount an extra 2.5” ssd on the top. If you don’t need these drives it is a perfect spot to fit fan controllers/hubsThe gpu bracket is cool.Power supply shroud looks great, where the psu sits has extra rubber for it to sit on easing vibration.Dust filters are magnetic and good.FYI the digital temp display requires a software to download and run but it is super low utilization. For me it uses 34mb of ram and 0% cpu and gpu. It is great that it is not bloatware.Despite what I’ve seen 3x120 mm fit on both the front and the top. With room to spare. UPDATE if using a 360 aio on the top there is very little room for the tubes when there are 3 fans in the front. Mine make contact with the casing for the top fan. The bottom 120mm mounts I am unsure about. The one is directly above the power supply and would not get much air to the fan, there is only a half inch gap from the power supply. I will be testing that later. UPDATE: as I now have fans in those spots I can say they definitely move air but I’m not entirely sure how effective it is. I just make sure to have the bottom front intake fan running at a higher rpm so that it is helping air to be back there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing style, good airflow, easily scratched
reviews.reviewText: This case just looks amazing and out of all the cases I have had I am the most impressed with this one. The built in LED screen is a nice plus to have to keep either your GPU or CPU temps in check and are actually accurate. Airflow on this case isn't among the best but its still has good airflow with a front and top mesh filter to keep the dust out. Easy to assemble and can even fit a 360mm radiator on the top but beware that mounting fans will likely scratch the case. What I mean by that is that when you screw in the screws I noticed it does scratch the case and the black color seems to chip off, other than that the case does smudge easily. Overall I think it is well worth the price of $99.99 and offers a lot for its price range. Very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shockingly Nice for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by this case as it was very nice quality for what it cost. I love the magnetic side panel (so easy to remove). I did swap out the back fan as I wanted a larger one but I do that on almost all my case purchases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm in love with this case
reviews.reviewText: I was stuck between a few cases but settled on this one. It met all my needs as far as dimensions and asthetics. The case has lots of room. I have a zotac 3070 dual oc GPU and wanted to upgrade in the future. My last case made that impossible being that my 3070 barely fit with the radiator up front. Cable management was OK in this case. Overall for the price and quality I could not find better. And I looked for weeks before deciding on this one. I am glad I did. The only thing I wish is if it came with 1 more fan and that they were both rgb. But that's cheap and I can dyi. (Last photo is reference of my old case build with no room) if you're stuck figuring out what case to get. Let me help you. Get this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm so impressed by the quality of this case. It has rubber grommets and a built in gpu anti sag bracket. Can not beat the quality for thePrice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great case I really like the design of it, sad it only comes with one stock fan. But was able to buy 3 more deepcool fans thats I installed into it. Best part is the case is one that actually fits a 360m cooler. Had a case before that was suppose to fit but didn’t. All around good case

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fantastic air flow and it holds 140mm fans
reviews.reviewText: no noice, and because of that i dont know if my pc is on XD and i have 140mm fans all over the case with a 280mm radiator on the top and it works as champ
Armé mi primera computadora, y no pude elegir mejor opción en relación calidad-precio.
